awd_titl_txt: Idaho SOARS II:  Science Objective Assessment and           Restructuring System -- A Planning Grant
awd_abstract_narration: This planning grant seeks to expand a National Science                          Foundation Teacher Enhancement Program, Idaho SOARS (Science                    Objective Assessment and Resuructuring System), to provide                      for the identification of K-12 leadership teams throughout                      Idaho school districts with special emohasis on urban and                       suburban schools.  The project will utilize and evaluate a                      school science improvement system.  The Planning Grant will                     allow the SOARS II team to do the following: (a) Revise the                     rural SOARS assessment instrument to better model urban and                     suburban schools; (b) Provide state-wide meetings to                            identify schools interested in and willing to fully engage                      in the SOARS II process for site based changes in science                       education; (c) Identify and refine teacher-as-leader                            materials for use in SOARS II; and (d) Establish a broad-                       based network of business and industry support for the SOARS                    II process.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
